title: Indian HC denies reports of political persons fleeing to India
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Indian High Commission has refuted all rumors regarding political persons who have fled to India.

Issuing a statement regarding rumours and claims circulating in sections of media and social media that certain political persons and their families have fled to India, the Indian High Commission stated that they are fake and blatantly false reports, devoid of any truth or substance.
Indian HC denies reports of political persons fleeing to India
